thread.title: Patriots get last laugh as NFL commissioner booed off stage
thread.title_full: Patriots get last laugh as NFL commissioner booed off stage

author: cbc
title: Patriots get last laugh as NFL commissioner booed off stage
text:
" Deflate Gate " seems to have lost its luster.
When the New England Patriots completed their historic comeback Super Bowl win on Sunday night, the moment many football fans had been anticipating was finally happening.
NFL commissioner Roger Goodell took to the stage to hand off the Lombardi trophy to the Patriots but his speech was drowned out by merciless boos.

Literally nothing but boos for Roger Goodell. Pats fans have been waiting for that moment. #SB51 pic.twitter.com/i5g4ytc2ml 
— @acptachi 
Must be rather deflating for Goodell to hear all those boos
— @WestWingReport Goodell quickly exited stage right while Patriots fans rejoiced and, as expected, the memes that followed the encounter were ripe.

Tom Brady to Roger Goodell: pic.twitter.com/6wereX7tpV 
— @BleacherReport 
Goodell and Belichick shake hands, and the ambient global temperature drops 31 degrees.
— @RattoCSN 
Roger Goodell after handing off trophy #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/L3Bs5R6t00 
— @BrianJHaddad 
Brady and Belichick laughing while Goodell is drowned out by boos pic.twitter.com/QTcusYKPV6 
— @OllieConnolly 
When Tom Brady sees Goodell as he walks onto the stage pic.twitter.com/gPKdmoqt24 #SuperBowl 
— @ShooterMcGavin_ 
Live look at Roger Goodell box: pic.twitter.com/wOwH6sjQGq 
— @daldridgetnt
